actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-980.
Called up by House by Rule.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 295 - 112 (Record Vote No: 384).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1437), the California Wilderness Act of 1983, in the House, without intervening motion, and the Senate amendment thereto.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1437 (California wilderness designations) and the Senate amendment thereto.

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1437), the California Wilderness Act of 1983, in the House, without intervening motion, and the Senate amendment thereto.
